Summary Note:
The RM met Ellen Camilla Kristensen during a business conference in Copenhagen. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Ellen Camilla Kristensen is a 64 year old retired Conglomerate Owner from Denmark.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Ellen Camilla Kristensen has been happily married to Thomsen since 1993. They are proud parents of 2 children: Rasmussen and Kristensen.
Education Background:
In 1980, Ellen graduated from Herning Gymnasium with a secondary school diploma.
Ellen finished her studies at Technical University of Denmark (DTU) in 1984.
Occupation History:
Ellen Camilla Kristensen is a 64 year old and comes from Denmark.
In 1985, Ellen Camilla Kristensen started working as a Plant Manager at FLSmidth & Co. A/S, marking the beginning of her successful career.
Her subsequent role was as a Operations Director at Velux A/S, where she continued to grow professionally from 1991 to 1995.
At Rockwool International A/S, she worked as a CEO from 1997 to 1998, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
She appointment as a Chairman at Velux A/S in 2000 marked a significant milestone in her career, as she took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
She held the position of Conglomerate Owner at Rockwool International A/S from 2004 until her retirement.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 10210000 DKK.
She has condo located in Helsing√∏r, worth 1003000 DKK.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns villa in Silkeborg worth 1782000 DKK.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful house in Skanderborg, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 2160000 DKK.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Ellen as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
